title: Trump: ‘Freedom’ for Iran is goal of ‘major military operation’
summary_full: The president spoke to The Washington Post early Saturday after announcing that the U.S. had begun striking Iran to bring about regime change.
summary_public: The president spoke to The Washington Post early Saturday after announcing that the U.S. had begun striking Iran to bring about regime change.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Trump: ‘Freedom’ for Iran is goal of ‘major military operation’
